author: kalb.com
title: Prom held for students who missed theirs in 2020 because of pandemic
text:
MADISON, Wis. (WKOW) – Students who were in high school in 2020 are getting a second chance to attend the prom they missed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
At the University of Wisconsin in Madison , senior class officers hosted a prom this year for those who originally missed theirs four years ago.
The majority of college students who graduate this spring were high school seniors when the pandemic hit.
Gracie Nelson, the university’s senior class president, said the senior class officers wanted to do something special for the soon-to-be graduates. They decided they wanted to give the graduating class their very own prom.
“I think you don’t even realize how much you’ve lost until you watch, like, the freshman,” she said. “And you’re like, ‘Oh, my gosh, you didn’t get any of that.’ And so I do think that, while I’ve had the best four years and really wouldn’t change any of it, I think there’s a new excitement about graduation and events and things like this.”
More than 800 people got tickets to go to the event.
Copyright 2024 WKOW via CNN Newsource. All rights reserved.

author: CNN Newsource
title: Ángel Sixto Rossi: "Emparentar homosexualidad y pedofilia habla de falta de respeto"
text:
Por Juan Moreno, CNN en Español
(CNN Radio Argentina) – Ángel Sixto Rossi, arzobispo de Córdoba, habló este jueves con CNN Radio sobre la salud del Papa Francisco y detalló que actualmente “el Papa está con bronquitis, pero confiamos en que se pondrá mejor y, mientras tanto, no ha dejado de atender a la gente”.
En Regreso CNN con Mariana Arias y Pepe Gil Vidal, junto a Diego Guelar, se refirió a los nombramientos que realizó el Papa Francisco y comentó: “Rompe con lo que tendría que ser y tiene una mirada más amplia. El Papa considera y tiene en cuenta muchas figuras que a veces quedan escondidas, pero que son de mucho nivel espiritual y humano”.
Sobre su frase “La crueldad de Milei no es cristiana ni humana”, explicó: “Ciertas actitudes, juzgadas desde la Iglesia, hacen pensar que es un tema religioso, pero en realidad es algo anterior a lo religioso y que hace a la dignidad del corazón humano”.
En relación con Donald Trump, el arzobispo señaló: “El Papa le pidió que Estados Unidos pueda ser tierra de oportunidades, que construya una sociedad más justa y que tenga un liderazgo que inspire unidad, solidaridad y comunión. Pareciera que Trump lo leyó y dijo: ‘Tengo que hacer todo al revés’”.
Ángel Sixto Rossi manifestó que “Trump no tiene que olvidarse de que es presidente de Estados Unidos, no presidente del mundo”.
Respecto al discurso de Milei en Davos sobre la homosexualidad, sostuvo: “Emparentar homosexualidad y pedofilia habla de falta de respeto y de ignorancia. Es un estilo de expresión que ya conocemos, nos ha hecho mucho daño y no nos gusta”.
“Empieza a desgastarse esta agresividad y ni a los suyos empieza a gustarle”, expresó.
The-CNN-Wire
™ & © 2025 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.

author: gauntlet_
title: #100 El papa Francisco pidió a Ucrania que levante la bandera blanca y negocie la paz
text:
[HackerRuso](/user/HackerRuso)a [ambito.com](/go/link/3916814) [#15](c15#c-15) En esos argumentos hay muchísimo de propaganda rusa. Antes de la llegada de los hombrecitos verdes en 2014 al Dombas, está era una zona tranquila sin mayores ansias independentistas de las que pudiera tener el país vasco.
El problema es que de repente apareció todo un ejército en estas regiones totalmente agresivo y expansionista. Solo hay que ver el avión de pasajeros derribado con armamento especializado.
Por poner un caso 100% documentado: el tribunal holandés que juzgo el asesinato de los 300 pasajeros determinó que de los 4 responsables directos, 3 fueron oficiales rusos y solo un ucraniano independentista. Y que el lanzamisiles es propiedad ruso, y fue trasladado inmediatamente a Moscú tras el atentado.
Yo no sé cómo hay gente que se traga la propaganda habiendo tanta información contrastada
[#12](c12#c-12) ¿Realista que Rusia se vaya a cambio de nada, después del coste humano y económico que ha sufrido en la guerra? Que mañana baje Dios y pare la guerra con sus poderes es más realista que eso que propones.

author: Luisa Giantin e Giorgia Zanierato
title: Jenny Corrò, la campionessa di body painting (e mamma) muore a 41 anni per un tumore scoperto tre mesi fa. La stessa malattia aveva colpito il papà
text:
MIRA - «Tutto in Jenny era colore: nessuno quanto lei amava la vita. Usava le tinte per parlare all’anima delle persone, per esprimere la sua». Si è spenta alle prime luci dell’alba di ieri la body artist 41enne di Mira Jenny Corrò, stroncata da una malattia incurabile che si era manifestata appena tre mesi fa. Lo scorso 4 dicembre, quella stessa malattia che ad aprile scoprirà averla pervasa, le aveva portato via anche il papà Claudio Corrò, scomparso a sua volta a meno di un mese di distanza dal nonno paterno Luigi. Per gli abitanti di Mira e Calcroci la famiglia Corrò era un’istituzione: il papà, unico macellaio di Calcroci, era amato e stimato da tutti, così come la figlia. Jenny, con la sua dipartita, non lascia nel dolore soltanto la madre Oriana, ma anche la figlia di 15 anni Maria: per garantirle gli studi, le amiche di una vita di Jenny hanno dato vita ad una colletta resa pubblica sulla piattaforma Go found me.
Il ricordo
«Jenny non aveva perso l’entusiasmo di vivere neppure di fronte a quella malattia rara che avanzava così inesorabilmente – ricorda l’amica Monica –. Persino appena tornata dall’intervento a Milano, poche settimane fa, aveva promesso a noi amici che appena si fosse ripresa avrebbe partecipato ad un bell’aperitivo in spiaggia». Diplomatasi giovanissima alla scuola di grafica pubblicitaria a Mestre, Jenny aveva capito ben presto che quella non sarebbe stata la sua strada e negli anni aveva fatto della sua passione, la pittura, la sua principale professione, specializzandosi sia nel body painting (pittura del corpo ndr), sia nel belly painting, ovvero nell’arte di disegnare sul “pancione” delle donne incinte l’immagine del futuro nascituro o una disegno beneaugurale. Così, nel 2023 è diventata vice-campionessa mondale di Make up sfx e vice-campionessa italiana nella categoria Open team. A dicembre dello scorso anno Jenny aveva vissuto uno dei momenti più dolorosi della sua breve vita, la morte per tumore del papà: nessuno poteva immaginare che a distanza di così poco tempo Jenny si sarebbe ammalata di una malattia simile quella del papà, ma in una forma ancora più grave. «Era una persona instancabile, amava dipingere ovunque – ricordano gli amici – Da ancor prima di specializzarsi nella pittura dei corpi, e ancor di più poi, ogni idea che le balenava per la mente la sperimentava prima di tutto su se stessa. Amava però anche dipingere vestiti, scarpe, oggetti e pareti, sempre ascoltando musica. Anche nelle ultime settimane, nonostante la malattia, Jenny era impegnata a programmare nuovi lavori e incontri». Il funerale di Jenny sarà fissato nei prossimi giorni.

author: NewsBreak Original
title: ‘IUD for men’ shows ‘positive’ results on par with vasectomy in early trials
text: As vasectomy interest piques , a new contraceptive for men is showing promising results in early trials. Billed as an “IUD for men,” ADAM , a first-of-its-kind water-soluble hydrogel, was found to significantly reduce sperm motility and concentration similar to that of a vasectomy — the difference being that the effects of the hydrogel are reversible. “We are thrilled to share these positive results which we believe take us one step closer to transforming the contraceptive landscape,” Kevin Eisenfrats, the co-founder and CEO of medical device company Contraline, said in a statement obtained by The Post. The preliminary data, released on Thursday, “suggests that it is possible to achieve similar levels of efficacy as long-acting female contraceptives like IUDs,” or intrauterine devices, which are more than 99% effective he added. “Ultimately, I’d like to make ADAM become a ‘no brainer’ for men when it comes to considering their options for contraception,” Eisenfrats said. The novel preventative technology is the latest in the pursuit of developing a contraceptive for men ; however, according to Contraline, the company is the first to make considerable progress compared to its competitors. Contraline’s initial testing of 23 healthy men, who were aged 25 to 65 and located in Australia, found a 99.6% to 100.0% reduction of motile sperm within 30 days of the noninvasive procedure, during which the hydrogel was injected into the reproductive tubes, called the vas deferens, to block sperm from entering the semen. The 20-minute procedure, which is completed under local or general anesthesia, involves piecing the scrotum and inserting the hydrogel through a catheter attached to the vas deferens, according to Wired . The participants, who were required to have “normal semen parameters,” were divided into two groups and received different amounts of hydrogel, which had a 100% successful implantation rate. They did not report any severe reactions, and any adverse effects that were reported were mild. “I am pleased with the early results we are seeing from the trial; it is exciting to see the preliminary outcomes showing ADAM is safe and effective,” urologist Dr. Peter Chin, an associated professor at the University of Wollongong in New South Wales, said in a statement. The participants will be monitored through follow-ups to analyze the long-term effects of ADAM. In the meantime, Contraline plans to file an Investigational Device Exemption this year before launching a trial in the U.S. The nearly two dozen volunteers for the “first-in-human” trial were selected from a pool of 1,500, the high level of interest suggesting “a major need for this type of contraception,” Chin noted. “Right now, there is nothing out there that’s long-lasting and reversible for men,” Eisenfrats told Wired. “This is made for people who are not ready to have kids, are spacing out having kids, or think they are done having kids but maybe not ready for that permanent option.”
